body.name: Instant Vortex 5.7QT Air Fryer With Accessories, Custom Smart Cooking Programs, 4-in-1 Functions that Crisps, Roasts, Bakes and Reheats, 100+ In-App Recipes, from the Makers of Instant Pot, Black
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 3 hrs
features: 4-IN-1 FUNCTIONALITY: Air fry, bake, roast and reheat
EvenCrisp TECHNOLOGY: Advanced technology that drives air flow top down for a perfect golden finish and crispy, tender results every time!
ONE-TOUCH SMART PROGRAMS: Customizable programs for one-touch wings, roasted veggies, garlicky potatoes, cookies, cinnamon buns and more!
FAST PREHEATING: Little to no preheating time, from frozen to golden in minutes! Create gourmet meals with the versatility of a temperature range of 120 to 400° F.
EASY CLEAN-UP: Non-stick, dishwasher safe air fry basket and tray.
A KITCHEN MUST HAVE: Perfect for quick delicious meals, preparing side dishes, appetizers, wings and more. Great addition to any kitchen.
DISCOVER AMAZING RECIPES: Download our free Instant Pot app, so you can create quick new favorites and prepare delicious meals, available iOS and Android.
SAFETY FEATURES: Built-in safety features like Overheat Protection, auto-off and more to keep your mind at ease.
INCLUDED ACCESSORIES: Grill plate and skewer set that helps you prepare endless amounts of recipes and appetizers.
body.description: The Instant Vortex™ air fryer is perfect for creating quick and delicious meals. With EvenCrisp™ technology, you’ll get crispy, tender results every time. The size is perfect -- big enough for growing families but compact enough to fit any size kitchen. Built-in smart cooking programs make it simple to use, with customizable programs for easy cooking and Overheat Protection™ for safety. Fast, versatile, and convenient, so you can make all your favorite fried foods with less oil and no mess. The Vortex offers the quality, convenience and versatility you’ve come to expect from Instant – discover amazing.；The product voltage arrange is 110V.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this airfryer! My last airfryer lasted quite a while and I was very happy with it so I was bummed when I had to purchase another after it suddenly stopped working. I did quite a bit of research and wanted something that was a little larger but not too large that it took up too much counter space. I also wanted something easy to use. This met all of the criteria. It it easy to use, makes food super crispy, is easy to clean and takes up less counter space than other brands. It also didn't have any strange smell that many people complain of when they first use their air fryer. I also thought the price point was very reasonable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Great & Easy to Use
reviews.reviewText: I bought this air fryer a year ago to replace my old air fryer that I had for 5 years prior (one of the original “As Seen on TV Air Fryers”). I did a LOT of research on air fryers before purchasing this one, comparing reviews and product dimensions to ensure that I had the appropriate counter space to fit it (it is a little larger and square-shaped compared to the round-shaped one that I had before). I’m telling you it is worth it!When you first use it, there is a strong metallic smell that comes from it that can be a bit alarming, but by the second or third use the smell is completely gone. I’ve had this air fryer for a year now and it still works just as great as it did on day one and is very easy to use. It fits a lot of food in it and the alert it gives, reminding you to turn your food, is super helpful. I make sure to hand wash it in between heavy use (cooking raw and frozen foods) but not as often in between reheating, unless there are spills, and it is still in great condition.I’ve used it to cook salmon, chicken, baked potatoes, and veggies. I once baked cookies in it and they came out pretty good. They just expanded slightly less than they would have in an oven. Of course, I cook up frozen foods in it (French fries, chicken nuggets, breakfast sausage, fried shrimp) and love the reheat setting when I want to quickly heat up and re-crisp leftovers. I use it at least a couple times a week. My sister bought the same air fryer at the same time that I bought mine and she loves hers too. If I haven’t said it already, BUY IT!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am glad someone told me about Insta Vortex. Easy to use, cooks well and easy to clean. Can't say more, I would buy this again and recommend it to others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: great product, easy to use, great value

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Makes great Nuggies
reviews.reviewText: I love the ease of use, quickness, and crispness of the food we cook. It makes regular old chicken nuggets and makes them amazing. Fries are pretty good. Can’t wait to make some wings. I’ve yet to try all the features, having only used the Air Fryer setting so far. Every reason why people like them, I agree with and as far as brands, we’ve always been happy with Instant Pot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Money Well Spent
reviews.reviewText: I like how easy it is to use, the size of the drawer, and how easy it is to clean. It cooks the food evenly. I like it warms up and beeps to let me know to add my food. It also beeps the let me know to flip my food half way thru the cooking time. There is nothing I don't like.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this air fryer. Works really good and simple to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very simple to use. Love the extra basket and rack that comes with it. Very easy to clean.

I wanted to like this and I am not sure if it was a return/used since it had finger prints on it and packaging was odd but I am returning it and have ordered another Ninja. I lost money on this one since I sold my Ninja to get this one. and now will pay full price again. (lesson learned).Things I noticed was that the door sticks so you really have to yank it open. The plastic looks cheap and as I mentioned it has marks on this one? I was not crazy about the cooking either. I followed the recipe and ribs were burned on outside and not soft on inside even though I lowered the temp. The instructions were simple. Maybe the more expensive Instant Vortex is better but I was not happy with this one. Such a pain to return.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: Would have been good air fryer but fail we s to run after a few minutes
reviews.reviewText: Looks like it would have been a good air fryer but smelt burning after a couple of minutes and a USA plug on it

reviews.reviewTitle: DON'T BUY! Arrived defective, terrible customer support.
reviews.reviewText: I followed the instructions and attempted the "test run" recommended by the manufacturer. In the middle of the test run, the drawer needs to be removed and placed back, when I put the drawer back in, the display says "Open". I unplugged the unit but it was still stuck on open. I contacted Instant customer support, the first girl told me to make a video of the problem and send that with the receipt and codes. When I had completed that, I waited on hold for over an hour and the guy just told me to return to Amazon and ended the chat without letting me reply. I'm pissed about this, we bought groceries specifically for this air fryer and had a meal prepared and ready to be cooked when this happened. No apology or concern from the company, like this happens all the time. After researching Instant brand air fryers online, I realized that they actually have tons of known issues and defects. The whole unit just felt cheap and crappy straight out of the box. Very disappointed. I will never buy this brand again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Product looked great and the added kit could be useful. However this product is for the US market and does not comply with the UK voltage system. To buy a converter/adapter would cost more than the item, and add to the cost of running the item in the UK.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 16, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Bought this on Black Friday... Then literally for 2 weeks got a message saying our for delivery by 8pm every day. When it finally arrived it is an AMERICAN product whic only works on 110 volts so completely useless here in the UK so sent it back the same dayUtterly disappointing
